item.title: Scripting Haskell and creating projects with Stack
item.description: How to script with stack How to Script with Stack How to create a stack project How to Build with Stack Write bitrot free code with Haskell Practical Haskell: Bitrot-free Scripts How to script with stack Install ghc 1 2 3 stack setup # or stack --install-ghc exec -- ghc --version Get the ghc version 1 stack exec -- ghc --version Compile a simple program 1 2 main :: IO () main = putStrLn "Hello World!
